descriptionHtml:
Allows both excellent mods (Heljarchen Farm and Heljarchen reformed) to be used in tandem. Landscaping was edited to that there would be no conflicts between the two of these mods.

NEW: v1.5 Made uses for more resources from Heljarchen Hall Reform. I did not add anything that was not already in the mod. I only adjusted their positions for compatibility instead of deleting them outright.

Load order:
Heljarchen_Reform_ver_2_BSA.esp (you need this version of his mod for this to work)
Heljarchen Farm.esp
HeljarchenFarmReformedv1.5.esp

FIRST:YOU MUST READ THE INSTRUCTIONS AND REQUIREMENTS FROM THE AUTHORS OF THE TWO MODS THAT THIS PATCH COMBINES. PLEASE THINK ON THIS BEFORE COMPLAINING IN CHAT : IT WORKS FOR ME AND IT WORKS FOR A LOT OF OTHERS THEREFORE IF YOU ARE HAVING ISSUES ITS MOST LIKELY ON YOUR END.

SECOND: WITHOUT A DOUBT THERE WILL BE MODS THAT CONFLICT WITH THESE MODS. I CANNOT HELP YOU THERE. IT WILL BE UP TO YOU TO ENABLE AND DISBALE MODS TO FIND THE CONFLICT IN YOUR LOAD ORDER. NOTHING YOU SAY OR DO WILL HELP YOU IF YOU DONT HAVE THE DLC REQUIRED TO RUN THESE MODS. LAST OF ALL IF THIS PATCH IS NOT LOADED LAST AFTER THE TWO MODS IT COMBINES IT WONT WORK. IF YOU ARE UNSURE PLACE IT VERY LAST IN YOUR LOAD ORDER.

Credit to:
deal5 (Heljarchen_reformed) http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33199/
Skvindt (Heljarchen Farm) http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50992/
for their excellent mods.....
author: Luckysneak
